title: #092 | TIM DILLON | UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT with JOEY DIAZ
description:
Welcome to The JOINT.....

It’s Wednesday, August 25th.....

Today we talk with our Friend & Comedian, TIM DILLON….

Follow Tim on Social Media: 

https://www.instagram.com/timjdillon

https://www.twitter.com/timjdillon

This episode is brought to you by Me Undies, Zip Recruiter & CBD Lion.....
